org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice

Interface DeviceEventsListener


  • public interface DeviceEventsListener
    The interface to be implemented in order to receive ControllableDevice relevant events

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void errorOccurred(ControllableDevice device, java.lang.String reason)
      Notify the interface implementer about an error in the device activities
      void sessionEstablished(ControllableDevice device, java.util.Collection<ControlPanelCollection> controlPanelContainer)
      Notify the interface implementer about session establishment with the remote device
      void sessionLost(ControllableDevice device)
      Notify the interface implementer about loosing session with the remote device

    • Method Detail

      • sessionEstablished

        void sessionEstablished(ControllableDevice device,
                      java.util.Collection<ControlPanelCollection> controlPanelContainer)
        Notify the interface implementer about session establishment with the remote device
        Parameters:
        device - The ControllableDevice
        controlPanelContainer - Used to request the Root UI Container and a relevant to it information
        See Also:
        DeviceControlPanel

      • sessionLost

        void sessionLost(ControllableDevice device)
        Notify the interface implementer about loosing session with the remote device
        Parameters:
        device - The ControllableDevice where the session has lost

      • errorOccurred

        void errorOccurred(ControllableDevice device,
                 java.lang.String reason)
        Notify the interface implementer about an error in the device activities
        Parameters:
        device - The ControllableDevice where the error has occurred
        reason - The error reason
